W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You are Siugnas, the Dismal King. Your tedious days spent on the throne came to a rather irksome end, but you rather look forward to what comes next.

W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You arrived in a graveyard, where you asked a maid what happened during your absence.

W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_DETAIL.text: You suspect that unpleasant man is waiting for you in the Dark Castle. You cannot wait to punish him.

W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_DETAIL.text: A pig warden with an insatiable appetite is waiting for you here.

W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_DETAIL.text: A snake warden concealing a twisted desire in his heart is waiting for you here.

W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_DETAIL.text: A bat warden that is ever sleeping is waiting for you here.

W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_DETAIL.text: A bull warden that is ever burning with rage is waiting for you here.

W03_EVAR_SIUG_LEVELUP_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_SIUG_LEVELUP_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: Should a king vacate his throne, those of great ambition can't help but push their luck. How will you handle this?
